remarks: Two points in the Kolmogorov quotient are equal iff the original points are topologically indistinguishable.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
statement:
kqval.2 $e |- F = ( x e. X |-> { y e. J | x e. y } ) $.
kqfeq $p |- ( ( J e. V /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( F ` A ) = ( F ` B ) <-> A. y e. J ( A e. y <-> B e. y ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d J x y $.
$d V x $.
$d X x y $.
